short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME:", purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Lethbridge Alberta by June 30, 2024.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by April 22, 2024 at 2:00PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.",
full_summary:
# EP922-240784 Cloisons_B Information

## Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4392143413
* **Publication Date**: March 27, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: April 22, 2024 at 2:00 PM EDT
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Contract dates are not provided, however, delivery and installation are expected by June 30, 2024

## Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

## Commodities and Sources

* **UNSPC**: 56100000 - Accommodation furniture
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None specified
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

##Contracting Entity and End User

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information**: Abou Ahmad, Kassan (SPAC/PSPC) at kassan.abouahmad@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

##Important Notes

* Due to clarification, all required supporting documentation and bid submissions are required by April 22, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT. Bids submitted after this time may not be considered.

The procurement involves the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture in Lethbridge, Alberta, on or before June 30, 2024, under the General Stream of Suppliers. This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada-Chili Free Trade Agreement, as well as Canada-Panama and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreements. For more details, please refer to the HTML attachment by visiting [the webpage link provided](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19236825?extsite=MTkyMzY4MjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). The attachment can be accessed once you have logged in to the website.
